name: Chinese Noodles

description: A complete Indian meal with various curries, rice, and bread

description: Thin crepe made from rice batter, served with chutney and sambar

description: Pasta with tomato sauce, basil, and parmesan cheese

description: Assorted sushi rolls with fresh fish and rice

description: Salad made with fresh vegetables, olives, feta cheese, and Greek dressing

description: Buttery, flaky pastry often served for breakfast or as a snack

name: Thai Curry
description: Spicy curry with coconut milk, vegetables, and choice of meat

name: American Burger
